mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.detail AS "detail", a.status AS "status"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tbl_area a
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_area( id, title, detail, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{detail}, #{status} )
